name: PowerUp Elevation (itch)
description:
PowerUp Elevation is an cool little simple 'autorun' platform game set in a world full of crushing elevators and deadly traps. Avoid spikes, use gravity flip, pick up powerups and time your jumps well in increasingly challenging stages in order to steal a kiss from your mate before the "death" time runs out.

In this Browser version, you might cannot save, unlike the steam version, so im added level codes and possible to skip levels.

Known issues:
- The game might not save, but instead you can uses level codes.
- The Arrows keys and right click does not work.
- The game might break if you uses a zoom level, both from system or in browser.
- Other minor issues.
